name: Tempered
description:
You have come into possession of objects of incredible power, and can use them on metal to push or pull. But you must be careful, as your weight relative to the object will come into consideration, and anything anchored down may have the opposite effect to that which you desire.

Use your push and pull abilities to fling objects, and yourself, through the chambers as your mettle is tested.

This game's core mechanic was inspired by magic, or allomancy, from Brandon Sanderson's Mistborn trilogy.

CONTROLS:

  • Left Mouse - Push
  • Right Mouse - Pull
  • W A S D - Movement
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • E - Drop held object
